thread.title: Barack and Michelle Obama Have Made Book Deals with Penguin Random House
thread.title_full: Barack and Michelle Obama Have Made Book Deals with Penguin Random House

author: Josh Feldman
title: Barack and Michelle Obama Have Made Book Deals with Penguin Random House
text:
Barack and Michelle Obama Have Made Book Deals with Penguin Random House by Josh Feldman | 7:18   
A little over a month since leaving the White House, Barack and Michelle Obama have already signed book deals: New books by @BarackObama and @MichelleObama have been acquired by @penguinrandom , the publisher says. pic.twitter.com/EkF5cfRaOH 
— Dave Itzkoff (@ditzkoff) February 28, 2017 
You’ll notice above they say the terms of the agreement “were not disclosed,” but the Financial Times reported earlier today that bids for the Obamas’ books hit over $60 million. 
And as a CNN report noted , the former president’s past books were also published by Penguin Random House. 
[ image via screengrab ]
